/* s_mtr902skrv_kdServiceImpl.selectList - Detail Data SELECT (s_mtr902skrv) */ BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON SET ARITHABORT ON SELECT A.COMP_CODE , A.DIV_CODE , A.INOUT_NUM /* 수불번호 */ , A.INOUT_DATE /* 수불일자(=입고일자) */ , A.INOUT_CODE AS CUSTOM_CODE /* 수불처(=거래처) */ , C.CUSTOM_NAME /* 거래처명 */ , A.INOUT_SEQ /* 수불순번 */ , A.ITEM_CODE /* 품목코드 */ , B.ITEM_NAME /* 품목명 */ , B.SPEC /* 규격 */ , A.MONEY_UNIT /* 화폐 */ , A.EXCHG_RATE_O /* 환율 */ , B.STOCK_UNIT /* 재고단위 */
/* 화폐단위 거래금액 */ , A.TRNS_RATE /* 입수 */ , A.ORDER_UNIT /* 구매단위 */ , A.ORDER_UNIT_Q /* 구매수량 */ , A.ORDER_UNIT_FOR_P /* 구매단가. 2020.10.12 구매단위기준단가로 수정*/ , A.INOUT_FOR_O /* 구매금액(화폐) */
/* 환율변환 자사거래금액 */ , A.INOUT_Q /* 재고수량 */ , A.INOUT_P /* 재고단가 (= A.ORDER_UNIT_P) 구매단가(자사)) */ , A.INOUT_I /* 재고금액 */ , ISNULL(P2.ITEM_DEPT_CODE, P2.PRDT_DEPT_CODE) AS TREE_CODE /* 요청부서 */ , ISNULL(E.TREE_NAME, '') AS DEPT_NAME , ISNULL(P2.ITEM_PRSN, P2.PRDT_PRSN) AS PERSON_NUMB /* 요청담당자 */ , ISNULL(F.NAME, '') AS PERSON_NAME
, P1.PO_REQ_NUM /* 구매계획번호 */ , P1.PO_REQ_SEQ /* 구매계획순번 */ , A.ORDER_NUM /* 발주번호 */ , A.ORDER_SEQ /* 발주순번 */ , ISNULL(A.GW_FLAG,'N') AS GW_FLAG /* 기안상태 - WB17 N.기안전, 1.기안, 2.반려, 3.승인 */ -- , ISNULL(G1.CODE_NAME,'') AS GW_FLAG , A.GW_DOC /* 기안문서 */ , A.DRAFT_NO --드래프트넘버 FROM BTR100T A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN BPR100T B WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE AND A.COMP_CODE = B.COMP_CODE INNER JOIN BCM100T C WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.INOUT_CODE = C.CUSTOM_CODE AND A.COMP_CODE = C.COMP_CODE INNER JOIN BPR200T D WITH (NOLOCK) ON D.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE AND D.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN BSA100T M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON M1.MAIN_CODE = N'M103' /* 입고유형 */ AND M1.SUB_CODE = A.INOUT_TYPE_DETAIL AND M1.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE INNER JOIN BSA100T M2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON M2.MAIN_CODE = N'M001' /* 발주유형 */ AND M2.SUB_CODE = A.ORDER_TYPE AND M2.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE LEFT JOIN MPO200T P1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON P1.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND P1.DIV_CODE = A.DIV_CODE AND P1.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM AND P1.ORDER_SEQ = A.ORDER_SEQ
LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT X.COMP_CODE, X.DIV_CODE , X.PO_REQ_NUM , Y.PO_SER_NO , Y1.TREE_CODE AS ITEM_DEPT_CODE , Y1.PERSON_NUMB AS ITEM_PRSN , Y2.TREE_CODE AS PRDT_DEPT_CODE , Y2.PERSON_NUMB AS PRDT_PRSN FROM MRE100T X WITH(NOLOCK) --구매계획 INNER JOIN MRE110T Y WITH(NOLOCK) ON X.COMP_CODE = Y.COMP_CODE AND X.DIV_CODE = Y.DIV_CODE AND X.PO_REQ_NUM = Y.PO_REQ_NUM LEFT JOIN S_MRE010T_KD Y1 WITH(NOLOCK) --구매요청 ON X.COMP_CODE = Y1.COMP_CODE AND X.DIV_CODE = Y1.DIV_CODE AND Y.ITEM_REQ_NUM = Y1.ITEM_REQ_NUM LEFT JOIN S_MRE090T_KD Y2 WITH(NOLOCK) --생산구매계획 ON X.COMP_CODE = Y2.COMP_CODE AND X.DIV_CODE = Y2.DIV_CODE AND Y.PRDT_REQ_NUM = Y2.PRDT_REQ_NUM ) P2 ON P2.COMP_CODE = P1.COMP_CODE AND P2.DIV_CODE = P1.DIV_CODE AND P2.PO_REQ_NUM = P1.PO_REQ_NUM AND P2.PO_SER_NO = P1.PO_REQ_SEQ
LEFT JOIN BSA100T G1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON G1.COMP_CODE=A.COMP_CODE AND G1.REF_CODE1=ISNULL(A.GW_FLAG,'0') AND G1.MAIN_CODE='A134' --결재상태 LEFT JOIN BSA210T E WITH (NOLOCK) ON E.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND E.TYPE_LEVEL = A.DIV_CODE AND E.TREE_CODE = ISNULL(P2.ITEM_DEPT_CODE, P2.PRDT_DEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN HUM100T F WITH (NOLOCK) ON F.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND F.PERSON_NUMB = ISNULL(P2.ITEM_PRSN, P2.PRDT_PRSN)
WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND A.INOUT_TYPE = N'1' AND A.ACCOUNT_YNC = N'Y' AND ABS(A.INOUT_Q) > ABS(A.ACCOUNT_Q) AND A.SALE_C_YN = N'N' AND A.CREATE_LOC = #{CREATE_LOC} /* 조달구분 - 2:자재, 4:외주, 6:수입 (1:영업, 3:생산,5:수출) */
AND A.DIV_CODE = #{DIV_CODE} /* 사업장 */
AND A.INOUT_CODE = #{CUSTOM_CODE} /* 거래처코드 */
AND A.ORDER_NUM LIKE '%' + #{ORDER_NUM} + '%' /* 발주번호 */
AND A.INOUT_DATE >= #{INOUT_DATE_FR} /* 입고일 FROM */
AND A.INOUT_DATE <= #{INOUT_DATE_TO} /* 입고일 TO */
AND ( P2.ITEM_DEPT_CODE = #{DEPT_CODE} OR P2.PRDT_DEPT_CODE = #{DEPT_CODE} )
AND ( P2.ITEM_PRSN = #{PERSON_NUMB} OR P2.PRDT_PRSN = #{PERSON_NUMB} )
AND ISNULL(A.GW_FLAG, 'N') IN ('1','3') /* GW기안 - 1.기안, 3.승인 */
AND ISNULL(A.GW_FLAG, 'N') IN ('N','2') /* GW기안 - N.미기안, 2.반려 */
SET NOCOUNT OFF SET ARITHABORT OFF END
